## R Markdown and Leaflet

Create a web page using R Markdown that features a map created with Leaflet.


```{r}
library(leaflet)
```

The map shows my town!

```{r}
my_map <- leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lat = 40.7747687, lng = ,-73.9126133, popup = "My Town")

my_map

```
